channel.title: International Border on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in International Border on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BC-99 North - Think Metric
item.description: BC-99 North at US/Canada border. Think metric - 30 km/h was 20 MPH. A smaller sign below that instructs Nexus traffic to keep right.

item.title: End CA-111 South at International Border
item.description: End CA-111 at the International Boundary. Mexicali is just past the border post.
